document.full_text: the top u.s. securities regulator on friday called for a broad reassessment of high-frequency trading on the one-year anniversary of the so-called "flash crash" of 2010.
document.title: sec head eyes fast traders on crash anniversary
lines_and_colors: the top u.s. securities regulator on friday called for a broad reassessment of high-frequency trading on the one-year anniversary of the so-called "flash crash" of 2010.
